GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object corresponding to the given article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments corresponding to the given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of a new comment added to the given article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of an article with updated votes

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment with the specified comment_id and serves a 204 status code with no content
